definitions.definition: Used to indicate the sound of a forceful blow , an explosion , etc.
examples: Wham ! The truck hit the wall.

definitions.definition: Used to indicate something dramatic , sudden , and unanticipated has occurred .
examples: Our relationship was going smoothly and then wham ! Out of nowhere he told me he was leaving me for another woman.

main_definition: Used to indicate the sound of a forceful blow , an explosion , etc.
secondary_definitions: Used to indicate something dramatic , sudden , and unanticipated has occurred .
